alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Polk; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 12:52AM CDT until May 06 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Greeley County in central Nebraska... Nance County in central Nebraska... Northwestern York County in east central Nebraska... Central Hamilton County in south central Nebraska... Merrick County in central Nebraska... Polk County in east central Nebraska... Eastern Howard County in central Nebraska... Northern Hall County in south central Nebraska... * Until 130 AM CDT. * At 1252 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Spalding to near Belgrade to near Chapman to near Alda, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Spalding around 1255 AM CDT. Fullerton, Belgrade and Archer around 100 AM CDT. Grand Island and Central City around 105 AM CDT. Phillips, Hordville and St. Libory around 110 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Genoa, Clarks, Marquette and Silver Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Greeley; Hall; Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Polk; York
